channel.title: Bringing Together Arlo and Heather
channel.description: Recent content on Bringing Together Arlo and Heather

item.title: Conversation
item.description: Lots of comment streams. Totally a forum. The blog-like thing is actually the Journey pages.

item.title: Events
item.description: Jan 11 — Coming Together Day Connecting Together A space for gooey yumminess. Open and connected. If this terrifies you…enjoy brunch! When: 10:00 Where: TBD Invite me! High Tea Totally tea. Not gin. Really. Don’t ask Heather. She said formal, so here it is! When: 14:00 Where: TBD Invite me! Jan 12 — The Date Arlo is Supposed to Remember Forever — Day — Wine and Connect Swing by for hugs, bubbles, and gossip while we’re primping.

item.title: Our Journey
item.description: Heather has written up some wonderful stories, but Arlo is too slow at websites, so they aren’t here yet. Come back in a couple of days. They should be up by Friday. They’re funny. They have pictures. Oh, and you will also be able to upload your own pictures (to flickr) and have them appear with stories. In case you have more “evidence” to support some of the wild accusations.
